page.title: 10Toll Bar School Game Rules
page.content: Here are the rules of some of the games they play at{Toll Bar School. { Kiss Catch:}You have a team of boys and a team of girls.The boys chase the girls.When they catch them they have to kiss them,but if they stuggle they are out.When every boy has kissed every girl, the girls then chase the boys.It goes on like that. {Two Ball:}You need two balls.You juggle against the wall and sing rhymes while you are doing this.But when you drop the ball or you don't know any more rhymes you are out.The other person has a go.It continues like so. {Piggy backs:}You need two teams of two and you have to try and knock each other off.You can hit each other,but you are not allowed to thump or pull hair only tickle and pull.The team that fall over first are out.
